plugins.name: Round to 8

üéØ Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Round multiple properties at once:

- Auto Layout (Padding & Spacing)

- Position (X & Y coordinates)

- Size (Width & Height)

- Font Size

- All Properties option


üé® Flexible Options:

‚Ä¢ Choose your rounding multiple:

- Multiple of 4

- Multiple of 8 (recommended for most designs)

- Custom value for specific needs


üîç Smart Selection:

‚Ä¢ Apply to selected elements only

‚Ä¢ Include all children elements

‚Ä¢ Preserve component instances


üí° Perfect For:

‚Ä¢ Maintaining consistent spacing in design systems

‚Ä¢ Cleaning up imported designs

‚Ä¢ Ensuring pixel-perfect layouts

‚Ä¢ Standardizing measurements across teams

plugins.name: Component Viewer
plugins.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you‚Äôre ready to streamline your design process!

accepted.name: Marta IB
accepted.description:
Hola! I am passionate UX designer, who specializes in crafting user experiences that are accessible, thoughtful, and truly enjoyable.

plugins.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
plugins.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
plugins.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

plugins.name: Color Frequency Visualizer
plugins.description:
Color Frequency is a powerful plugin for Figma that helps you analyze and visualize the color distribution within your designs. By sorting pixels based on color frequency, the plugin gives you a clear understanding of your design's color balance. It‚Äôs perfect for designers looking to ensure harmonious color usage and improve overall design aesthetics.


The plugin can also help you apply the classic 60/30/10 rule of color proportion, ensuring that your primary, secondary, and accent colors are balanced in your design. Whether you‚Äôre working on UI designs or visual compositions, Color Frequency helps maintain color harmony and creates visually pleasing layouts with ease.
plugins.tagline: Analyze and visualize color frequencies with precision ‚Äî organize your designs by the spectrum

plugins.name: Typosys
plugins.description:
Typosys is a Figma plugin designed to simplify and accelerate the creation and management of typography systems.

By selecting a base font and size, you can effortlessly generate styles that scale proportionally. The plugin supports custom naming, font faces, weights, sizes, line heights, and letter spacing. It also introduces a multi-dimensional mode system, allowing you to tailor styles for specific devices like desktop, tablet, and mobile. Once completed, the styles are imported into Figma, fully linked to dynamically generated variable collections.



Benefits


  1. Faster workflow: Set up your typography system in minutes.
  2. Consistent scaling: Styles are proportional to the base size for a cohesive design.
  3. Flexibility: Each style can be individually customized.
  4. Device-specific optimization: Use modes to adjust styles for different screen sizes.
  5. Variable integration: Styles are automatically connected to dynamic Figma variable collections.



Key Features


  1. Base font and size selection
  2. Proportional typography style generation
  3. Customizable font face, weight, size, line-height, and letter-spacing
  4. Mode-based dimensions (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile)
  5. Automatic variable generation and linking
  6. One-click import

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer ‚Äî crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your typography system in seconds.

plugins.name: Colorama
plugins.description:
Type in a hex color value and generate a 0-1000 number range for your primitive tokens. Not sure if this should be closer to 100, 200, or somewhere in between? Plug your values into Colorama and get a precise variable name.


Want them on your canvas? Just a click away.


Need your dark color values to be lower on the number scale? Select the direction to flip the number order on light/dark tones. Then click to copy and paste the values into your Figma variables collection.


Run several values at once with a comma separated text string. For example:

#ff0000, #123ABC, #223344
plugins.tagline: A powerful yet simple way to name your design tokens as primitive variables in Figma.

plugins.name: Shopdev: Figma to Shopify Liquid
plugins.description:
Figma to Shopify Liquid

Turn any Figma design into responsive Liquid code that‚Äôs ready to publish to your Shopify theme with the Shopdev Figma plugin. Select your frame in Figma, import it into Shopdev, and deploy in a few clicks, no coding required.


How it works

  1. Open the plugin: Launch the plugin directly within your Figma design file.
  2. Select the frame: Choose any frame, like a hero, banner, testimonial, or promo section.
  3. Click ‚ÄúImport frame‚Äù: The plugin automatically transfers your selected design to shopdev.ai.
  4. Customize prompt (Optional): You‚Äôll see a pre-filled prompt ‚ÄúBuild this Figma import‚Äù; you have the option to add extra input if desired (e.g., "Use a slider for the images on mobile").
  5. Submit the prompt: Shopdev will generate responsive Liquid code you can preview.
  6. Edit and iterate: Continue prompting shopdev to refine your design until it‚Äôs perfect.
  7. Publish: Click to deploy directly to your Shopify theme.


Support

For additional support using this plugin, ask questions in the Shopdev Discord channel.


Tips for best results: Use Auto Layout

Auto Layout isn‚Äôt required, but it helps the AI better understand your design‚Äôs structure and spacing. Using it can lead to more accurate imports with less additional prompting needed, especially for responsive layouts.


From Figma to Shopify with the help of Shopdev, an AI Shopify developer

With the Shopdev Figma plugin, you can convert any static Figma design into live, editable Shopify theme sections, ideal for:

  1. Homepage sections like banners, product features, testimonials, or value props
  2. Landing page sections that can be reused across multiple campaigns
  3. PDP add-ons like trust badges, comparison charts, or upsell modules
  4. Reusable content blocks that can be dragged and dropped across templates
  5. Custom sections for any part of your store without needing a developer


Shopdev automatically interprets your Figma design and generates responsive Liquid code that works natively within Shopify‚Äôs theme system. You can edit the output manually or continue refining it through prompts.
plugins.tagline: Use AI to turn any Figma design into Shopify-ready Liquid code

plugins.name: Protege AI
plugins.description:
Protege AI for Figma: Legal Compliance, Simplified

Contact founders@protegecounsel.ai to get a trial account.


In the dynamic realm of marketing, aligning content with legal standards is crucial yet challenging. Protege AI for Figma is crafted to empower in-house legal teams, offering a robust tool to review marketing materials quickly and effectively. This Figma plugin integrates flawlessly into your design workflow, using advanced AI to identify and highlight legal concerns in real time.


Key Features:


  1. Automated Content Analysis: Deploy state-of-the-art AI to scan designs for legal issues like copyright infringement, regulatory non-compliance, and sensitive language.
  2. Real-Time Feedback: Instantly receive suggestions and edits within Figma, enabling swift adjustments and compliance checks.
  3. Customizable Legal Libraries: Adjust the AI‚Äôs scanning abilities to match your specific legal standards and requirements, ensuring a tailored and relevant review.
  4. Collaborative Review Process:** Enhance cooperation between legal and marketing teams with in-document comments and edits, making the review and approval process smoother.
  5. Comprehensive Reporting:** Produce in-depth reports on the legal review process, including issues identified and resolutions, for compliance tracking and audit trails.


Benefits:


  1. Save Time and Resources: Significantly cut down on the time dedicated to reviewing marketing materials, freeing your legal team for more strategic tasks.
  2. Enhance Accuracy: Reduce the risk of missing legal issues with the AI‚Äôs detailed analysis.
  3. Improve Collaboration: Foster a more efficient and collaborative relationship between your legal and marketing departments.
  4. Ensure Compliance: Keep up with changes in regulations with an AI tool that adapts to new legal standards.


Ideal For:


  1. In-house legal teams aiming to enhance the review of marketing content directly within Figma.
  2. Marketing teams looking to accelerate compliance and mitigate legal risks in their creative.
  3. Legal professionals seeking to utilize technology for more efficient and integrated workflows.
plugins.tagline: Protege AI: Streamline Legal Reviews for Creative & Marketing

plugins.name: ColorSync by Blader
plugins.description:
Plugin Description


ColorSync by Blader is an advanced tool for designers who need to generate professional color palettes, precise color harmonies, and perfectly balanced gradients. It uses functional algorithms to ensure professional-quality results directly in Figma.


Detailed Feature Breakdown


1. Core Controls


Color Picker


  1. Function: Sets the base color for all harmonies.
  2. Usage: Click to select any hue or manually enter HEX values.


Color Quantity


  1. Function: Controls palette size (1-20 colors).
  2. Pro Tip: Use 3-5 colors for minimalism, 10+ for complex systems.


Color Format


  1. Options: HEX, RGB, HSL.
  2. Function: Toggles value display (e.g., #FF5733 ‚Üí rgb(255, 87, 51) ‚Üí hsl(12, 100%, 60%)).


Dark/Light Mode


  1. Function: Optimizes UI for low-light or bright environments.


2. Harmony Types


  1. Each option uses color theory principles:


Complementary


  1. What it does: Creates 2 opposing colors (180¬∞ apart).
  2. Best for: Maximum contrast (CTAs, alerts).


Analogous


  1. What it does: Generates 3-5 adjacent colors (30¬∞ increments).
  2. Best for: Harmonious designs (branding, backgrounds).


Tints, Shades & Tones


  1. What it does: Produces luminosity/saturation variations (+20% tints, -20% shades).
  2. Best for: Design systems needing consistent scales.


Compound


  1. What it does: Blends complementary + analogous colors (4-6 colors).
  2. Best for: Data viz, illustrations requiring depth.


3. Output Sections


Generated Palette


  1. Content: Displays colors based on your settings.
  2. Pro Tip: Click any swatch to copy its value.


Color Buttons


  1. Function: Compact palette for quick design integration.


Gradient Generator


  1. What it does: Creates CSS-ready gradients from your palette.
  2. Usage: Copy/paste directly into Figma styles or CSS.


4. Advanced Features


Multilingual Support


  1. English, Spanish, and Chinese localization.


Smart Copy


On click:


  1. Shows "Copied!" confirmation
  2. Auto-formats to selected color space


Professional Use Cases


  1. UI Design: Build component libraries with perfect contrast ratios.
  2. Branding: Test logo color combinations instantly.
  3. Illustration: Find coherent shadow/light palettes.
  4. Presentations: Create slide decks with harmonious schemes.


Sample Workflow


  1. Set corporate blue (#2E86AB) as base color.


  1. Select "Compound" harmony with 6 colors.
  2. Copy the auto-generated gradient for hero banners.
  3. Export HSL values for design documentation.
plugins.tagline: Pro-grade color harmonies & palettes in one click

plugins.name: ThumbSpan
plugins.description:
ThumbSpan helps you determine which UI elements

are particularly hard to reach with the thumb while using

the phone one-handed.


The Area of Reach of the thumb has been based on empirical evidence, sourced from academic studies. Please see the last picture for the current supported one-handed phone positions, more to be added soon...


How Does it Work

  1. ThumbSpan adds a gradient Layer to your frames.
  2. It is recommended to apply it on a copy of the frame
  3. The Copy should not have any Auto Layout.
  4. It allows you to select Opacity and Hand Position
  5. It also allows you to select between Left and Right Hand
  6. These Layers can be cascaded - applied one after another (You can apply it for both Left and Right hand together)




This Plugin is still in Beta, Please send any bug reports and feature requests to my email: its.shahab.khan10@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Check which parts of your UI within the average thumbspan

plugins.name: KeyFinder
plugins.description:
KeyFinder simplifies the process of retrieving and copying Figma component keys.


Features


Flexible Scope Selection: Choose from three options:

  1. Current Selection: Displays keys and names for your selected components and component sets.
  2. Current Page: Retrieves all components and component sets on the active page.
  3. Entire File: Accesses components and component sets across your whole Figma file.

Component Set: Option to include or exclude component sets in your results.

One-Click Copy: Quickly copy the displayed component information to your clipboard for easy sharing.

Clear Visualisation: View component keys alongside their names for easy reference.

accepted.name: Kaio Batista
accepted.description: The world's a roller coaster and I'm not strapped in

plugins.tagline: Find and list all your Figma component keys
